Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our free resume builder

Is this resume builder really free?

Yes, our resume builder is completely free with no hidden costs. You can create, edit, and download your resume in multiple formats without any payment required.

What does ATS-friendly mean?

ATS-friendly means our resume templates are specifically optimized to pass through Applicant Tracking Systems used by 99% of employers to screen job applications, significantly increasing your chances of getting noticed by recruiters.

Can I download my resume as PDF?

Absolutely! You can download your resume in multiple formats including PDF, Word document, and plain text - all completely free and without any watermarks.

Do I need to create an account?

No account is required to start building your resume. You can begin immediately and create your professional resume in minutes without any sign-up process.
